title: 关于BC 求解求解
author: Tianjiu
txt_content:
If you wish to use ip forwarding please enable it in your Bungeecord config as well   客户端进服务器的时候显示这个 后台显示


/127.0.0.1:64224 lost connection：If you wish to use ip forwarding please enable it in your Bungeecord config as well

replies.author: 秋风残叶
replies.txt_content:
请在子服根目录中的spigot.yml中，找到
  bungeecord: false复制代码
如果他不是false请将其改为false，希望对您有所帮助
